description.fr: Protéger les {ObjectMechanism:189,plural:other!} et vaincre tous les Taures. \--- Les Taures ne jouent pas de sort.
description.en: Protect the {ObjectMechanism:189,plural:other!} and defeat all the Taurs. \--- The Taurs do not play spells.
description.es: Proteger las {ObjectMechanism:189,plural:other!} y vencer a todos los toros. \--- Los toros no lanzan ningún hechizo.
description.de: Beschütze die {ObjectMechanism:189,plural:other!} und besiege alle Tauren. \--- Die Tauren spielen keinen Zauber aus.
description.pt: Proteger os {ObjectMechanism:189,plural:other!} e derrotar todos os Tauros. \--- Os Tauros não lançam feitiços.
